sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for October 22 - 23

event: ScareFest Weekend at the Central Bank Center at 11 a.m.
"Tootsie" at the Lexington Opera House at 1 p.m. and 7:30 p.m.
Chevy Chase Street Fair on Euclid Ave from 2 p.m. to 10 p.m.  Euclid Ave will be closed between S Ashland Ave and E High St from noon until 10 p.m.
Halloween Festival and Thriller Parade in downtown Lexington from 4:30 p.m. to approximately 9 p.m.  See street closures below.
